remarks: An unordered triple of ordered pairs restricted to all but one first components of the pairs is an unordered pair of ordered pairs. (Contributed by AV, 14-Mar-2020.)
statement:
tpres.t $e |- ( ph -> T = { <. A , D >. , <. B , E >. , <. C , F >. } ) $.
tpres.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
tpres.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
tpres.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. V ) $.
tpres.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
tpres.1 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= A ) $.
tpres.2 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= A ) $.
tpres $p |- ( ph -> ( T |` ( _V \ { A } ) ) = { <. B , E >. , <. C , F >. } ) $.
